name: Mahjong Solitaire: Tile
summary:
This version of the game Mahjong is a traditional Chinese Mahjong. Chinese Mahjong is one of the popular games in the world. Mahjong is one of the game names. It is also known as: Shanghai Mah Jong, Chinese Mah-jong,Titan, Top Mahjong, Majong, Kyodai. The game is suitable for you if you want to spend a few minutes to a few hours quietly.
Game rules are very simple, all you need is to find the identical tiles and click (matching) on them, during the intended time for the level. This educational game is very useful for all age categories, it will help you to develop the speed of thought, reaction, logic and just lift your spirits. It is a perfect friend game of speed! You can compete with your friends using the table of world leaders, thus show who is cooler in the game Mahjong. By publishing your results to Facebook, you can find new friends.
